body: I don't really have well-developed thoughts here. The cost is slowing down startup a bit, the benefits aren't really super-clear to me. I expect that in something like 90% of cases we wouldn't need to refetch that quickly (ie the refetch will be a no-op), so not sure it would really make sense to continually refetch like that without further conditions (e.g. recent update (so version and therefore eligibility changes for studies), more than X amount of time since last update, etc.). But that's just a gut sense of things, so I could be wrong.
